ygData.subject: Re: I am curious - Instill Doubt
ygData.msgSnippet: you can only practice it at the bard guild in freeport from carskin (the monk looking guy) upstairs.  i think we get it at level 26, but i heard about it a few
ygData.messageBody:
you can only practice it at the bard guild in freeport from carskin (the
monk looking guy) upstairs. i think we get it at level 26, but i heard
about it a few levels after so not definite. it is like fear except on a
single target.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 11:43 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] I am curious - Instill Doubt
>
>
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> What is instill doubt anyway? I haven't got it yet (soon I
> think?) but have
> seen no descriptions of it anywhere.
>
> Elwyn
> Level 21 Bard
> Erollosi Marr
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 2:41 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] I am curious - Instill Doubt
>
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> me too. i have hit the button a million times and it has
> never gone up. my
> level 40+ bard friend says he got his to master just by using
> it, but i have
> been unsuccessful. it basically just sits there as a macro i
> never use, but
> wish i could.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 46 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
>

> > From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 11:34 AM

> >

> > From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
> >
> >
> > Has anyone on this list:
> >
> > a) Ever seen Instill Doubt increase in skill?
> > b) Ever intimidated anyone or anything?
> >
> > I have been using this skill ever since I got it, and I've
> > done nothing other
> > than pose and prance with it.
> >
> > Jyzan
